# simulated data not accounting for variant


```{r}

data_incidence0 <- readRDS('../simulations/incidence.rds')

no_zero_incidence_start <- which(rowSums(data_incidence0>0)==4)[1]
data_incidence <- data_incidence0[no_zero_incidence_start:nrow(data_incidence0),]
SI_sim <- readRDS('../simulations/si.rds') 


target <- readRDS('../simulations/target_Rt.rds')
# reposition the traget according to start in non-zero incidence
for(i in 1:ncol(data_incidence)){
  target[[i]] <- target[[i]][no_zero_incidence_start:nrow(data_incidence0)]
}

```

## prepare

```{r}
n_location <- as.integer(4)
# n_variant <- as.integer(2)
I <- data_incidence[,c(1,3,2,4)]

t_window <- 7
t_start <- seq(2, nrow(I)-(t_window-1)) 
t_end <- t_start + (t_window-1)

# preprocessed

O_I <- apply(I,2,EpiEstim::overall_infectivity, si_distr = SI_sim)

mI <- array(NA, dim = c( n_location,
                         length(t_start),
                         ncol = t_end[1] - t_start[1]+1) )
m_O_I <- mI
for(k in 1:(n_location)){
  for(i in 1:dim(mI)[2]){
    mI[k,i,] <- I[t_start[i]:t_end[i],k]
    m_O_I[k,i,] <- O_I[t_start[i]:t_end[i],k]
  }
}
useful <- (rep(1,dim(mI)[3]))


## prior R
mean_prior <- c(2)
std_prior <- c(1)

param_gamma <- epitrix::gamma_mucv2shapescale(mu = mean_prior,
                                              cv = std_prior/mean_prior)

```
